header.description: You and the A.I. take turns in coloring a so far uncolored edge of the hexagon graph in one's color. The first player completing a triangle (only triangles between the orange colored dots count) of his or her color LOSES the game. This game is related to graph theory, in particular to Ramsey(3,3). It is also known as the Sim game (see http://goo.gl/x276UQ for details). It's quite hard to win! Enjoy! Update: now with two difficulty levels.

noteBrick.note: Used to avoid 2 lines pressed at the same time.
